PROJECT_PATH.description: Point to what you want to be a project root. See https://medium.com/@timanovsky/heroku-buildpack-to-support-deployment-from-subdirectory-e743c2c838dd for details.

GOVERSION.description: Specify a Go version for this project. See https://github.com/heroku/heroku-buildpack-go/issues/301#issuecomment-632663726 for details.
